channel.title: SAM9 on Arash's blog

item.title: SAM9
item.description: Introduction SAM9-EVAL is an evaluation board based on at91sam9260 Atmel SoC. It has an old ARM926EJS core. But because of it QFP208 package, you can have your own evaluation board with simple 2 layer PCB. That’a what I’ve done! Specification AT91SAM9260 SoC (ARM926EJS core) 64 Mbytes SDRAM 256 Mbytes NAND flash 4 Mbytes Atmel Data Flash DP83848 Ethernet physical layer FT232BL USB to serial converter ÂµSD card slot History First version of board (V1.
